Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 32 Here , we synthesized low band - gap copolymers incorporating 9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene ( TA ) and DPP as an electron - donating and electron - withdrawing unit , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap |
| 9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA) |
| DPP |

Explanation:

* "low band-gap" is a property of the copolymers being synthesized.
* "9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA)" and "DPP" are chemical compounds being used as electron-donating and electron-withdrawing units, respectively. They are considered "property names" because they are being used to describe the properties of the copolymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap |

Explanation:

* "low band-gap" is the only valid entity that clearly refers to a material property in the paragraph.
* "9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA)" and "DPP" are chemical compounds, not material properties.

Paragraph: 32 Here , we synthesized low band - gap copolymers incorporating 9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene ( TA ) and DPP as an electron - donating and electron - withdrawing unit , respectively.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* "32" which refers to some sort of identifier or label in the context of the original source of the paragraph.
* "low band-gap" which refers to a property of the copolymers being synthesized.
* "9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA)" which is a specific chemical compound used in the synthesis.
* "DPP" which is another specific chemical compound used in the synthesis.

* "electron-withdrawing" which describes the role of the other chemical compound in the synthesis.

The only valid "Property Value" entity in the paragraph is:

* "low band-gap" which refers to a property of the copolymers being synthesized.

The other entities do not clearly refer to "Value of material property". For example, "32" is not a material property, but rather an identifier or label. Similarly, "9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA)" and "DPP" are chemical compounds, not material properties. Finally, "electron-donating" and "electron-withdrawing" are roles or functions, not material properties.
